title: A Trip to the Mountains
english_text:
Hi Alex,
Thanks for your email! It's great to hear from you. A trip to the mountains sounds like a fantastic idea. I would love to join you and your family.
I'm free the weekend after next, from the 15th to the 16th. Would that work for you?
You asked about what to bring. I can prepare some sandwiches and snacks for our hike. Should I also bring my own sleeping bag? Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with.
I'm really looking forward to it!
Best wishes,
Sam
chinese_translation:
嗨，亚历克斯，
谢谢你的邮件！很高兴收到你的来信。去山区旅行听起来是个很棒的主意。我很乐意和你及你的家人一起去。
下下个周末我有空，从15号到16号。这个时间对你来说可以吗？
你问到要带什么。我可以为我们的徒步旅行准备一些三明治和零食。我还需要带自己的睡袋吗？如果还有其他我能帮忙的，请告诉我。
我真的很期待这次旅行！
最好的祝愿，
山姆

title: A Surprise in the Garden
english_text: One sunny afternoon, I decided to read my book in the garden. Suddenly, I heard a strange noise coming from behind the big apple tree. I put my book down and walked slowly to see what it was. Peeking behind the trunk, I saw a small, colorful bird with a hurt wing. It looked scared and couldn't fly. I carefully picked it up and took it inside. My mum helped me make a comfortable box for it with water and seeds. We looked after the bird, and after a few days, its wing was better. It was amazing to watch it fly away!
chinese_translation: 一个阳光明媚的下午，我决定在花园里看书。突然，我听到大苹果树后面传来一阵奇怪的声音。我放下书，慢慢走过去看到底是什么。从树干后面偷看，我看到一只带着伤了翅膀的、色彩鲜艳的小鸟。它看起来很害怕，飞不起来。我小心翼翼地把它抱起来带进屋里。我妈妈帮我为它做了一个舒适的盒子，里面放了水和种子。我们照顾着这只小鸟，几天后，它的翅膀好了。看着它飞走的感觉真是太棒了！
